sentences.en: Grate the carrot finely / into small pieces.
How kind of someone to give me the carrot!
sentences.cn: 谁这么善良给我胡萝卜 呀 !

sentences.en: I could snap your neck like a carrot.
sentences.cn: 我可以把你的脖子掐断,同折断一根胡萝卜一样,不费吹灰之力.

sentences.en: I'll have some more carrot ( s ).
sentences.cn: 我还要一些 红萝卜.

sentences.en: Instead of snacking on crisps and chocolate, nibble on celery or carrot.
sentences.cn: 不要把薯片和巧克力当零食来吃，要吃些芹菜和胡萝卜。

sentences.en: Mix the meat with the onion, carrot, and some seasoning.
sentences.cn: 把肉和洋葱、胡萝卜及一些佐料搅拌在一起。

sentences.en: The carrot - and - stick theory of motivation works reasonably well under certain circumstances.
sentences.cn: 胡萝卜加大棒的激励理论在一定的环境中能够合理地发挥作用.

sentences.en: The carrot had turned the soup a glorious pink.
sentences.cn: 胡萝卜使汤呈现出极漂亮的粉红色.

sentences.en: The cook is grating a carrot.
sentences.cn: 厨师正在把胡萝卜磨成细丝.

sentences.en: The cook is grinding the carrot into threadlike thing.
sentences.cn: 厨师正在把胡萝卜磨成细丝。

sentences.en: Their method of negotiating is a combination of the carrot and the stick.
sentences.cn: 他们谈判的方法是软硬兼施.

sentences.en: They will be set targets, with a carrot of extra cash and pay if they achieve them.
sentences.cn: 会给他们设定目标，如果能达到，就能得到额外的现金和报酬。

sentences.en: When I eat rice rolls, I pick out every carrot.
sentences.cn: 每次我吃饭卷时, 我都会把胡萝卜挑出来.

sentences.en: Whether or not it then gets the carrot depends on the whim of the mule driver.
sentences.cn: 那时候它是否吃得到这串萝卜,得看驴夫的高兴.

sentences.en: You should eat such vegetables as carrot, celery and spinach.
sentences.cn: 你应该吃胡萝卜 、 芹菜和菠菜这类的蔬菜.

phrases.tran_cn: 软硬兼施的；胡萝卜棍棒并用的

trans.tran_cn: 胡萝卜， （为说服人做事所许诺的）好处，酬报
trans.tran_en: a long pointed orange vegetable that grows under the ground
a long pointed orange vegetable that grows under the ground
